client_sql_auth: select PE_ID,PE_Hash,PE_STS,PE_FName,PE_LName,PE_LL_Tstmp,PE_Email,C.C_ID,C.C_Name,C_ATstmp,0 INV_OVERDUE from CPE inner join C on C.C_ID = CPE.C_ID inner join UCOD_C_STS on UCOD_C_STS.CODEVAL=C.C_STS and UCOD_C_STS.CODECODE='A' where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email);

select CPER.CR_Name as SR_Name from CR inner join CPER on CPER.CR_Name=CR.CR_Name inner join CPE on CPE.PE_ID=CPER.PE_ID where CR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email) and PE_STS='ACTIVE';
client_sql_login: select PE_ID,PE_Hash,PE_STS from CPE where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email)
client_sql_superlogin: select PE.PE_ID,PE_Hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.PE_ID = PE.PE_ID and SPER.SR_Name='SYSADMIN' where PE_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email)
client_sql_loginsuccess: update CPE set PE_LL_IP=@PE_LL_IP,PE_LL_Tstmp=@PE_LL_Tstmp where PE_ID=@PE_ID;select @@rowcount as XROWCOUNT;
client_sql_passwordreset: update CPE set PE_HASH=@PE_HASH,PE_LL_Tstmp=@PE_LL_Tstmp where PE_ID=@PE_ID;select @@rowcount as XROWCOUNT;
admin_sql_auth: select SPER.SR_Name from jsharmony.SR inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.SR_Name=SR.SR_Name inner join jsharmony.PE on PE.PE_ID=SPER.PE_ID where SR_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email) and PE_STS='ACTIVE';
admin_sql_login: select PE_ID,PE_Hash,PE_STS from jsharmony.PE where lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email)
admin_sql_superlogin: select PE.PE_ID,PE_Hash from jsharmony.PE inner join jsharmony.SPER on SPER.PE_ID = PE.PE_ID and SPER.SR_Name='SYSADMIN' where PE_STS='ACTIVE' and lower(PE_Email)=lower(@PE_Email)
admin_sql_loginsuccess: update jsharmony.PE set PE_LL_IP=@PE_LL_IP,PE_LL_Tstmp=@PE_LL_Tstmp where PE_ID=@PE_ID;select @@rowcount as XROWCOUNT;
admin_sql_passwordreset: update jsharmony.PE set PE_HASH=@PE_HASH,PE_LL_IP=@PE_LL_IP,PE_LL_Tstmp=@PE_LL_Tstmp where PE_ID=@PE_ID;select @@rowcount as XROWCOUNT;
admin_sql_check_email: select PE_Email from jsharmony.PE where PE_ID=@PE_ID
